Package entity

Class BTOApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.BTOApplication
  • public class BTOApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    The BTOApplication class represents an application for a BTO (Build-To-Order) flat. Applications are submitted by applicants for specific projects and flat types. Each application has a lifecycle with various statuses and can be withdrawn. This class manages application data and provides functionality for creating, tracking, and managing housing applications.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BTOApplication

        public BTOApplication()
        Default constructor that initializes a BTOApplication with default values. Creates an application with current date and PENDING status.

      • BTOApplication

        public BTOApplication​(Applicant applicant,
                      Project project,
                      FlatTypeEnum flatType)
        Constructor that initializes a BTOApplication with the specified applicant, project, and flat type. The application date is set to the current date, status to PENDING, and withdrawal status to NA (not applicable). Also adds this application to the applicant's list of applications.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant submitting the application
        project - The project being applied for
        flatType - The type of flat applied for

      • BTOApplication

        public BTOApplication​(java.lang.String applicationID,
                      Applicant applicant,
                      Project project,
                      FlatTypeEnum flatType)
        Constructor that initializes a BTOApplication with the specified applicant, project, and flat type. The application date is set to the current date, status to PENDING, and withdrawal status to NA (not applicable). Also adds this application to the applicant's list of applications.
        Parameters:
        applicationID - The BTO Application ID associated for this BTO application
        applicant - The applicant submitting the application
        project - The project being applied for
        flatType - The type of flat applied for

      • requestWithdrawal

        public boolean requestWithdrawal()
        Requests withdrawal of this application. Only pending applications with no existing withdrawal request can be withdrawn.
        Returns:
        true if the withdrawal request was successful, false otherwise
